== Theodore Kokkoris, 12 ==
Mytilene, Greece

=== About me ===
I'm 12 years old. In my free time, I code (mainly in C++ and Node.JS) or I hang out on [[http://reddit.com|Reddit]]</nowiki>. I have an Asus EeePC 1101HA.

=== Why using Ubuntu? ===
It has a strong and helpful community and it is open source. It's also lightweight.

=== My contributions to Ubuntu ===
I hang out on <nowiki>[[http://reddit.com/r/Ubuntu|/r/Ubuntu]]</nowiki> and help people with any problems they have.

I also regularly ask questions on <nowiki>[[http://aksubuntu.com|AskUbuntu]]</nowiki>.
